biological_subject.about: An Ensembl geneID or an Uniprot protein ID.

properties.association_context: Choose_one: gene, gene_allele, gene_in_ld_region, gene_variant, gene_in_epigenetic_regulation_complex, transcript, transcript_isoform, protein, protein_complex, protein_isoform, protein_signaling_pathway
associated_subjects: Array: If this association is also about other genes or proteins, please provide the additional Ensembl/Uniprot IDs as an array. Examples where you might need these are in gene_in_ld_region, gene_in_epigenetic_regulation_complex, protein_complex, protein_isoform, protein_pathway

experimental_evidence_specific.property_name_1: XXXX: add as many properties as you like but please make sure these are concepts that a disease expert will be able to understand

provenance.date_asserted: Date the assertion was made expressed using javascript standard: 2014-09-11T10:59:43.511Z
provenance.is_associated: boolen value; for our first round, we will focus only on positive findings so just use '1' for now.

pubmed_refs: Array: Please provide the supporting pubmed IDs.

expert.statement: Can you describe the association in a few sentences?

database.id: Please provide a unique database name e.g. Uniprot/Reactome/GWAS_catalog

dbxref.id: if the evidence has been obtained from another database, please provide the name here
dbxref.url: The entry point in the dbxref database that cttv should point to

evidence_codes: Array: Choose all the relevant evidence codes from the file cttv_evidence_codes.xlsx to support this evidence. If an appropriate code does not exist, please email a request to malone@ebi.ac.u, cc: samiul.x.hasan@gsk.com

urls.biojs: full address of the supporting biojs component if it exists

linkouts.nice_name: An array of nice_name&url tags; nice name for the URL
linkouts.url: URL entry point in your application

association_score.probability: If you can provide a probability from 0-1 for this association, please provide it here
association_score.p-value: If you can provide a p-value for this association, please provide it here

experimental_evidence_specific.property_name_1: XXXX: add as many properties as you like but please make sure these are concepts that a disease expert will be able to understand

biological_object.about: A disease or a phenotype expressed using its EFO term

biosamples: Array: affected tissues and cells expressed using their EFO terms

experimental_evidence_specific.property_name_1: XXXX: add as many properties as you like but please make sure these are concepts that a disease expert will be able to understand
